message.subject: JAPRO Gruppen Aktiebolag
message.content:
M1.1. Martin sent this message to London and Michael advised that Sullivan &
Cromwell be retained.
[Inform: Martin sent a presumably attached message to London, and Michael advised for a law firm to be retained]
M1.2. With respect to interest by the CFTC in the proposed
transaction, would you agree that the same law firm advise on that issue as
well?
[Request-Information: would Mark agree that the same law firm advise on another issue]
Flink1.2
M1.3. Makes sense to me.
[Inform: this makes sense to Sara]
M1.4. Also, what is Energydesk.com LImited?
[Request-Information: what is Energydesk.com Limited]
Flink1.4
M1.5. Sara
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: JAPRO Gruppen Aktiebolag
message.content:
M2.1. Per my voice mail.
[Inform: something presumably attached is in accordance with Sara's voice mail]
M2.2. Let me know what you think.
[Request-Information: what Mark thinks about this]
Flink2.2
M2.3. SS
[Conventional: signature]

message.subject: JAPRO Gruppen Aktiebolag
message.content:
M3.1. I think S&C is fine - they are helping us with CFTC issues related to online
trading
[Inform: Mark thinks keeping Sullivan & Cromwell is a good idea]
Blink1.2
Sflink3.1
M3.2. and Energy Desk.com seems somwhat related.
[Inform: EnergyDesk.com seems related to CFTC issues]
Blink1.4

message.subject: JAPRO Gruppen Aktiebolag
message.content:
M4.1. Martin:
[Conventional: salutation]
M4.2. Sorry for the log jam but I always thought that the law firm was the
best idea.
[Inform: apology for delayed reply, and Sara had always thought that keeping the law firm was the best idea]
Blink3.1
M4.3. Call if you need assistance.
[Inform: Martin can call if he needs help]
M4.4. Sara
[Conventional: signature]
